newsitem.title: ESTONIA: Hansabank, Forexbank active on Estonian bourse.
newsitem.headline: Hansabank, Forexbank active on Estonian bourse.

text.p: Ativity on the Estonian stock exchange leapt on Friday, boosted by healthy trade in leading bank Hansabank and in Forexbank, dealers said.
Overall activity was 7.4 million kroons versus 3.44 million kroons. The Tallinn stock exchange rose 0.15 percent to 95.84.
Hansabank was the most active stock on trade of 3.8 million kroons and it closed at 92.40 kroons, a slight rise from Thursday's 92.20 kroons.
Forexbank traded 2.14 million kroons of stock and ended at 77 kroons, unchanged. Even normally quiet Tallinna Bank was in demand as it turned over 1.26 million kroons.
Its price was slightly lower at 39.35 kroons, versus 39.40.
Savings Bank, in the news as shareholders approved a merger with the Bank of Industry and a 10 million kroon share issue, was barely traded.
it registered business of just 68,110 kroons at a price of 34.70 kroons, down from yesterday's 34.95.
On the free market, Tallinn Pharmaceuticals dominated with trade of 924,157 kroons and a price of 41.80 kroons, a surge from yesterday's 37.40 kroons.
Total free market business was 1.4 million kroons.
